sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Rivers of Illinois Coordinating Council Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Rivers of Illinois Coordinating Council Act.

sections.heading: Purpose. The Rivers of Illinois Coordinating Council was created by Executive Order 2013-5
sections.text: This Act is the implementation of Part III of that Executive Order, together with additional provisions to ensure that the Council is able to function as intended under that Executive Order. The intent of thi

sections.heading: State agency duties. State agencies represented on the Council shall provide to the Council, upon request, information concerning agency programs and activities that impact the Illinois River Watershed and the rivers
sections.text: State agency duties. State agencies represented on the Council shall provide to the Council, upon request, information concerning agency programs and activities that impact the Illinois River Watershed and the rivers.

sections.heading: The Illinois River Watershed Restoration Act is repealed.
sections.text: The Illinois River Watershed Restoration Act is repealed.

sections.heading: The Mississippi River Coordinating Council Act is repealed.
sections.text: The Mississippi River Coordinating Council Act is repealed.

sections.heading: The Wabash and Ohio Rivers Coordinating Council Act is repealed.
sections.text: The Wabash and Ohio Rivers Coordinating Council Act is repealed.
